testsuite.name: shoppingCart.RemoveFromCartTests

testcase.name: 1) Removing a valid quantity updates cart and stock
2) Removing the full amount removes item from cart
3) Removing more than in cart should fail
4) Removing a product that isn't in the cart should fail

testsuite.system-out: Stock of product ID 1 updated to 5 Product ID 1 quantity in cart updated to 5. Successfully added product ID 1 to cart! Stock of product ID 1 restored to 9. Product ID 1 quantity in cart decreased to 3. Successfully removed 2 of product ID 1 from cart! Stock of product ID 1 updated to 5 Product ID 1 quantity in cart updated to 5. Successfully added product ID 1 to cart! Stock of product ID 1 restored to 15. Product ID 1 completely removed from cart. Successfully removed 5 of product ID 1 from cart! Stock of product ID 1 updated to 5 Product ID 1 quantity in cart updated to 5. Successfully added product ID 1 to cart! Not enough quantity in cart. Requested to remove: 10, Available: 5 Stock of product ID 1 updated to 5 Product ID 1 quantity in cart updated to 5. Successfully added product ID 1 to cart! Product ID 2 not found in cart.
